incidents.name: Twilio Billing Discrepancies for Short Code and Alpha Sender Messaging Fees

incident_updates.body: Twilio billing services for short code and alpha senders were degraded between March 22nd at 08:10 and April 7th at 13:31 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have seen discrepancies in message fee charges for messages sent from short code and Alpha sender IDs to a subset of countries. The issue has now been resolved. Twilio will issue the appropriate credits to the impacted accounts. Customers donât need to take any further actions.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with SMS shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the SMS issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that the impact is now resolved. We have consolidated all impacting Twilio impacted services in to one incident. You can check the details at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/n3y9kflwkmm0.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS short-codes. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twillio API Error Responses

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS, MMS, Proxy, Verify, Lookup, and Proxy services were degraded for 30 minutes between 8:00 am and 8:30 am Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues on interaction with Twilio API with numbers to be rejected or returned with error responses. The issue has now been resolved.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Voice. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
